readable.title: 3265578645_4044a7049a
readable.content: A person stands in front of a white and red bus . A person with long hair and a black coat stands in the street in front of a bus while people on the sidewalk look on . A woman in jeans and a black jacket standing on the road in front of a white and red bus . Man with back to camera standing in front of a bus The person looks cautiously into traffic to be sure no car is coming .
